sentences.english: Earth people of "peaceful golden" cannot be realized in a country.
sentences.chinese: 地球人类之“太平盛世”无法在一国实现。

sentences.english: But, history prove less pardons in brilliant times, more pardons in troubled times.
sentences.chinese: 盛世时赦少，乱世赦多也是历史所证明的。

sentences.english: How can call earth human society has realized "peaceful golden"?
sentences.chinese: 怎样才能称之为地球人类社会实现了“太平盛世”呢？

sentences.english: The novel expressed a warning in the flourishing age of late feudal society.
sentences.chinese: 《红楼梦》是封建社会末期的“盛世危言”。

sentences.english: Hearing the song of prosperity in my dreamland.
sentences.chinese: 睡梦中听见盛世的欢唱。

sentences.english: Saatchi & Saatchi has been handling Mead Johnson's creative account in Asia for the last six years.
sentences.chinese: 盛世长城已在过去六年代理美赞臣亚洲创意事务。

sentences.english: Now the carol of peace and prosperity prevails in the vast land of the Northern Anhui.
sentences.chinese: 盛世欢歌，飘荡在皖北大地上，余音绕梁。

sentences.english: His year exhibition of《the national cloud of rich world》was collected into big volume.
sentences.chinese: “盛世国风”年展入选并入编大型画集。

sentences.english: Millennium Park is an extension of Chicago's Grant Park.
sentences.chinese: 太平盛世公园是对芝加哥格兰特公园的扩大。

sentences.english: On September 19, the Chinese businessman prosperous times growth fund ended as scheduled collects.
sentences.chinese: 9月19日，华商盛世成长基金如期结束募集。

sentences.english: The full glory of the O'Connors will never return.
sentences.chinese: 奥康瑙尔家族盛世的光辉将一去不复返了。

sentences.english: In the history of the tang dynasty was formed "kaiyuan time" boom.
sentences.chinese: 历史上的唐朝之所以形成“开元盛世”的繁荣景象。

sentences.english: Chinese Kang Xi times, had been the country enrichs the people strong, picture of a flourishing age.
sentences.chinese: 中国康熙时代，已经是国富民强，一片盛世景象。

sentences.english: And written as "Prosperous prophecy" out of time as two similar ideas were despise.
sentences.chinese: 其作为与写《盛世危言》时如出两辙，被人齿冷。

sentences.english: The Change of the Soviet Union's policies on the regime of Sheng Shi-tsai and its impact.
sentences.chinese: 苏联对新疆盛世才政策转变的因素与影响。
